website_summaries.verdict: A long battery life and 3-digit LED screen paging units for easy expansion highlight the benefits of this paging system.
pros: When fully charged, these 10 units retain a charge up to 72 hrs
on standby mode or an impressive 36 hrs
The units have a range of over 300' indoors, or 1/3 mi
Prompt modes include flash, bell, vibration, or any combination
The 3-digit LED readout that identifies each paging unit makes this system expandable up to 999 units, a helpful feature for growing businesses
cons: While the small size of these units makes them handy for customers, it also makes them easy to misplace

customer_reviews.title: some pagers could not react as we call from the keypad Transmitter
customer_reviews.text: We planned to use the pager system for family day event in our Avila T. public library. We gave a single receiver for kids, and called them as the event ends. Unfortunately, there were few pagers actually working during the event. More pager couldn't react as we pressed the numbers on the keypad base. We got checked afterward that there was no issue about the "calling range", as we put those non-functional pagers near the transmitter, there was still nothing happened.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie. F

customer_reviews.title: Terrible, crap, waste of money
customer_reviews.text: This products is terrible! It stopped working after a month, the bepping was so annoying, the numbers begun to disappear shortly after, i want a refund
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.Cynthia Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: good customer service.
customer_reviews.text: *Updated review * I was upset that charging base and one of the disks wasn’t working. However the company Nadamoo quickly sent me a replacement for both..no questioned asked.
customer_reviews.author: catana padilla

customer_reviews.title: Great system for the money
customer_reviews.text: Is this the best pager system you could buy? No it is not. Is it a fantastic product at the price point? Absolutely. We purchased 3 of these systems and they have worked out really well. Their success has led to our other locations purchasing 3 units. That alone is an endorsement of the product. Not only did we purchase we repeated the purchase multiple times. We did have a couple of pagers that did not vibrate but the company quickly sent us replacement units to correct the issue. Super easy dealing with them and they stand behind their product. We have been using the systems for roughly 3 months and the pagers are handed out all day every day.
customer_reviews.author: Steve & Nichole Power

customer_reviews.title: HAPPY HAPPY HAPPY
customer_reviews.text: Pros: We purchased these in 2018 for our wood fired pizza truck to alleviate having to hire an extra staff member to deliver pizza to guests inside breweries or shout out names at events. They have been amazing, high tech, far reaching, and extremely cost effective. We simply type in a pager number onto the order ticket, and when done, staff punches the number into the keypad and the guests come out to get their food. Easy stuff. Cons: Two of the pucks no longer work at all, and one other has a faulty digital readout so that the "8" reads like a "U"... other than that, we will continue to use and recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: TGS

customer_reviews.title: One didnt work.
customer_reviews.text: Works well only thing us one came in not working. I emailed them and they got back to me to replace the damage pager with no extra charge. Customers love the pagers and so do we. Sad thing is hasn't been a year and pagers are starting to die and won't recharge.
customer_reviews.author: Donna M

customer_reviews.title: Nice but faulty
customer_reviews.text: The packaging was nice, quality seems nice. My only issue with it is that the charger base is not functional. I have to plug directly into the puck to charge.
customer_reviews.author: Locitopedrito

customer_reviews.title: Easily broken and malfunction
customer_reviews.text: Great product that will last for a few weeks and slowly they die and will not work. Truly disappointed that after a few usage that the product will no longer function as stated in the sellers we site. Waiting on response from company. For the price paid it did not hold up! Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: SMOKED@225 LLC

customer_reviews.title: I like these buzzers
customer_reviews.text: I like these buzzers, but a few of the ones we bought originally just stopped working a few weeks in. They are sturdier than the ones we bought the first go around and I also like the fact that you can buy them individually. Overall I do recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Naude

customer_reviews.title: Great customer support
customer_reviews.text: The product works great, we just had 1 issue with one of the beepers being defective. Once we reached out to the seller & sent a video of what was going on, they were able to send a replacement quickly. Very pleased with the customer service. Definitely would buy again with confidence!
customer_reviews.author: YD

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: I love these little things. Maybe a tad bit small, but they do the job and people are happy to use them.
customer_reviews.author: Bmore4now

customer_reviews.title: Nice and Simple
customer_reviews.text: Just received them. Easy to reprogram extra pucks to communicate with one transmitter, takes 5 minutes. Distance seems very good. Took one about 75 feet next door, through 5 brick walls with drywall and worked fine. We will see how they hold up to daily use and customers dropping them.
customer_reviews.author: scott

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful customer service
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, clear instructions and best of all, really amazing customer service. You get an actual friendly person! Would totally recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Elissa Perez

customer_reviews.title: easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: it's a good option. So far everything worked well and the customer service was very fast solving doubts.
customer_reviews.author: Cesar G

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: The pagers are smaller than I thought but I really like them. We use them at our QSR restaurant, and give them to customers when they order, and page them when their food is ready. I like that you can choose preset the pagers to light up and vibrate or just light up, and also change the number of the pagers to what you want.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler A.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery, as described only 4 stars because they don’t stay charged very long
customer_reviews.author: Sheree

customer_reviews.title: Pagers
customer_reviews.text: These pagers are a good value. The pager range is not the greatest, but they do the job. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Duane Iwamura

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and set up!
customer_reviews.text: These pagers have been working great at our Elementary School. They are being used to page certain students when it is time to go to a different classroom. Great feedback from classroom teachers. Easy to use and set up. Also, it is easy to change modes when needed - light+buzzer, light+vibration, or light+buzzer+vibration.
customer_reviews.author: Angie Joslin

customer_reviews.title: The product is wonderful.
customer_reviews.text: The product is wonderful. The pagers work right out of the box. No pairing needed. But if you accidentally set it to wrong number,you can remove the number and pair them again. Have had it for a couple of months, so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: betty

product_meta.title: NADAMOO Restaurant Pager System with 10 Coaster Pager Wireless Paging System Calling System Portable Rechargable Restaurant Buzzers with Numeric Keypad Transmitter
product_meta.description:
Color:Pager system

One-Year Warranty and replacement
We provide one Years of Hassle free Warranty and Replacement

The device was designed to make calling easier—whether it's from staff-to-staff or staff-to-guest.

Don’t confine guests to a long queue—
Our system could get customers out of the trouble of defending their place in a long line.
Customer could find a comfortable place to have a rest without having to worry about missing their turn.
Customer receive the notification instantly when their table is ready

Plus, you can improve productivity by speeding up internal communication and keeping employees on task.
Our paging system has enough range to be sure that your staff will be notified, with strong vibrations or beeps.

Improving operational efficiency and customer satisfaction has never been easier with the help of NADAMOO hand-held pagers. 

Features:
Adopts advanced 433Mhz radio frequency wireless technology, penetrates walls, ceilings and floors more effectively 
built in 3.7V rechargeable battery in receiver with stacked one piece charging,avoiding the trouble of changing batteries frequently
Include 10 portable receiver.It is allow to renumber .
The 999-channel keypad transmitter could call up to 999 receiver. You can always add more pagers to the system as your business grows

Alert Modes
Flash,Bell,Vibration or any combination of them
Battery life
Built-in 360mAh rechargeable lithium battery;at least 72 hours on standby and 36 hours while in use,depend on use frequency
Transmission distance
100 meter / 330 feet under the obstacles environment ,500meter /0.3 mile in the barrier free environment,


Package Includes
10 x Pagers
2 x Power adaptor
1 x Keypad transmitter
1 x Charging base
1 x manual
feature_bullets: Includes 10pcs pager receiver for guest use, 1 signal transmitter and 1 charging base for waiter . Ready to use as soon as you receive it.
Based on 433MHZ radio-frequency , signal can penetrate 10 walls, trasmit up to 100meter / 328ft indoors, The longest distance in the barrier free environment is 500 meter / 0.3 mile.
A built-in 3.7V rechargeable battery in receiver with stacked one piece charging , avoiding the trouble of changing batteries frequently.Battery life:at least 72 hours standby,36 hours in use.
Prompt mode of receiver :Flash, Bell,Vibration or any combination of them.
Thress digit Big LED screen,999-channel keypad transmitter can be expanded maximally to work with 999 pager receiver; You can always add more pagers to the system as your business grows.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars26 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
